plentry.pd:
Whether the watermark is visible in the local preview view:
: (Default) The watermark is visible in the local preview view.
: The watermark is not visible in the local preview view.
The area to display the watermark image in landscape mode. See .

pd.props: cpp unreal bp unity electron rn flutter cs

plentry.pd: When the adaptation mode of the watermark is , it is used to set the area of the watermark image in landscape mode. See .

The area to display the watermark image in landscape mode. This parameter contains the following members:
x: The horizontal position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
y: The vertical position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
width: The width of the watermark area (px).
height: The height of the watermark area (px).
The area to display the watermark image in portrait mode. See .

pd.props: cpp unreal bp unity electron rn flutter cs

plentry.pd: When the adaptation mode of the watermark is , it is used to set the area of the watermark image in portrait mode. See .

The area to display the watermark image in portrait mode. This parameter contains the following members:
x: The horizontal position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
y: The vertical position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
width: The width of the watermark area (px).
height: The height of the watermark area (px).

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity electron rn flutter cs
plentry.pd: When the watermark adaptation mode is , this parameter is used to set the watermark coordinates. See .

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity electron rn flutter cs
plentry.pd: The adaptation mode of the watermark. See .
